description: Slightly modified the breakdown sections by fixing a few notes. Switched up the second breakdown section, as they are different. Fixed the issue with bars 124/128, and the one with 148/156.

description: Made the lead silent by accident (amended)

description: Added a silent combined track so you don't have to switch between Syn's tracks when reading.
title: Bat Country

description:
Changed the open D note in the chorus riff to an open A.
Roughed in some palm mutes in the outro.
Roughed in some clean guitar during outro (it's there, but I know I got it wrong).
Fixed the fancy hammer-ons in the solo tab that aren't in the song.
title: Bat Country

description: Songsterr soundbank is missing D2 for Distortion Guitar and loads D4 instead, so using the Distortion Guitar soundbank for overdriven bass (or any guitar soundbank) won't work. Reverted all back to a clean bass sound, and added notes where the overdrive pedal should be engaged and disengaged.
title: Bat Country

description:
Removed live parts from intro. They're outdated anyways, and the band starts the song differently live now.
Fixed the 2nd half of the 2nd verse.
Fixed pretty much everything wrong with the bass line, including the not reported issues.
Added overdriven bass track separately from clean bass track, but I'll revert this if Songsterr's soundbank sounds bad with overdriven bass.
Fixed other minor issues.
title: Bat Country

description:
- Changed vocals to oboe
- Changed backing vocals to clarinet
- Added lyrics, as a result of which I had to remove all of the repeats
- Fixed track names
- Merged 'live-only' track into the lead
title: Bat Country
